Salt Lake City, Utah - Solera Networks

We are a vc-funded network security forensics company. We have a great engineering team, in an almost all engineering company (80% are engineers). We have the need for some great people, with a wide range of talent. We have needs in kernel development, systems code (C/C++), handle large volumes of data (100's of tB) to web front end interface development.

Full benefits. Lots of vacation. Great people to spend your day with.

http://www.soleranetworks.com/company/careers
